column1: Uchi////Botan Ebi - one of the items we got gratis. They were experimenting with a new dish. It seemed to use a lot of the shrimp guts to make the sauce
column2: to the point that it was slightly overpowering. The fried portion of the shrimp was rather bland by itself but worked well with the sauce. The tender
column4: but I didn't mind it. The lotus I felt didn't really add much to the dish as it was rather bland and neutral.
